dict.acceptation: 供给；产生；举办；（为购买某物或做某事而）支付；

sent.orig: After bending over too far backward, they react, going from give-give-give to stubborn resistance.
sent.trans: 当他们弯过头了，他们会反弹，从给-给-给到顽固抗拒。

sent.orig: I hope that as you go on your way, you dont give in nor give up!
sent.trans: 在人生的道路上，希望你永不屈服，永不言弃！

sent.orig: Give him a gastric lavage immediatly and then give him the antidote.
sent.trans: 立即给他洗胃，然后给他解毒药。

sent.orig: Do I give baidu section to contribute entry whether to mark or not? Give a number?
sent.trans: 我给百度百科贡献词条给不给分啊？给多少？

sent.orig: I require give you a surprise. You certainly do give me a surprise.
sent.trans: 我想给你唯一惊喜。你确实给了我唯一惊喜。
